world_core.core_concept: Human civilization's division and alien crisis across the vast Milky Way galaxy

world_essence.scope: The entire Milky Way galaxy, containing tens of thousands of star systems

world_essence.core_conflict: Dual crisis of human internal division and alien invasion

basic_background.time_point: Late era of human space age, galactic-scale expansion has continued for hundreds of years

basic_background.key_event: 地球联合国 suffered sudden raid from alien forces, an entire stellar region fell

basic_background.core_locations: 地球联合国 (centered on Solar System), 人类联邦 (centered on 天津四 star system)

core_concept_terms.地球联合国: Wealthy, xenophilic but decadent human power with low administrative efficiency

core_concept_terms.人类联邦: Militarily powerful, xenophobic human power with many enemies

core_concept_terms.天津四: Star system housing the 人类联邦 capital, reached by early colony ships through wormholes

core_concept_terms.禁忌科技: Beyond-conventional technology means used by invading alien forces

world_themes.civilization_conflict: Contradictions and cooperation between human civilizations with different political ideologies and cultural backgrounds

world_themes.survival_crisis: Human unity and division in the face of alien threats

world_themes.technological_ethics: Moral choices between the use and limitation of 禁忌科技

core_technologies.interstellar_travel: Coexistence of wormhole jumps and sub-light speed travel

core_technologies.communication_systems: Hyperspace communication networks, limited by distance

core_technologies.energy_systems: Antimatter engines and quantum crystal energy

universal_laws.physics: Dominated by real physical laws, with specific wormhole phenomena

universal_laws.abilities: No supernatural abilities; advanced technology appears miraculous but still follows physical laws

universal_laws.light_speed: Light speed limit actually exists; wormholes are the main means of crossing interstellar distances

human_alien_relations.multicultural: Different star systems develop unique cultures and political systems

human_alien_relations.complex_relations: Complex diplomatic network of friendly trade, cold coexistence, and open hostility

human_alien_relations.technological_gap: Technology gaps between different civilizations cause power imbalances
